thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Brightcove Q1 Loss Per Share $0.06

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Brightcove Q1 Loss Per Share $0.06
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - Brightcove Inc:
* BRIGHTCOVE ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FIRST QUARTER FISCAL YEAR 2018
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.00 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.06 * Q1 REVENUE $41.2 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $40.2 MILLION
* SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.06 TO $0.07 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $41.3 MILLION TO $41.8 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.06 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.02, REVENUE VIEW $40.6 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 NON-GAAP NET INCOME IS EXPECTED TO BE A LOSS OF $0.06 TO INCOME $0.02 PER DILUTED SHARE
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.01, REVENUE VIEW $166.8 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* REMAIN ON TRACK TO DELIVER AGAINST OUR BOOKINGS GROWTH TARGET FOR YEAR Source text for Eikon:
